title: Inside Europe: 22.09.2022
description: What does Russia’s military escalation mean for Ukraine and its allies? The Estonian town with a Russian twin across the river, and after Sweden's lurch to the right, Europe awaits Italy's election results. Also: An immigration lawyer imagines Paddington Bear as his client, why Albanians can't wait to leave the country, and Eco Opera — where birds can play musical instruments.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Russian mobilization, Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Albania emigration, Italy election, Giorgia Meloni, far-right politics, Russian expatriates, Estonia, Paddington Bear, migration, Oktoberfest, economic cooperation
